Limited Time Offer!<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
20¢ off every gallon of gas for 3 months! *
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
As you may know, the 76® team was in your area last week promoting our FLEET CARD PROGRAM and as a follow up I would like to introduce myself to you as your local 76 Fleet representative.
I wanted to let you know that it’s not too late to take advantage of the special offer and save 20¢ per gallon* for the next 3 months! Sign up by August 31st, 2013 and enjoy one of the best savings in the industry.
Whether you have 2 or 200 company vehicles, the savings and convenience is tremendous:
· Save 20¢ per gallon from now until the end of the year every time you use your card at any 76® location.
· Enjoy easy online controls so you can set spending limits and monitor driver behavior.
· Sign up to receive Instant alerts when drivers purchase outside of company policy.
· Enjoy convenient access to over 7400 76®, Phillips 66®and Conoco® locations nationwide. Ask for our Universal Card, and you’ll have acceptance at over 90% of all U.S. fueling sites.
· Best-in-class customer service available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
Our FLEET CARD is the perfect tool to help you save time and money when it comes to your vehicle fleet operations. Simply call me at {!User.Phone} or via email at {!User.Email} to learn more.
I look forward to meeting with you about the needs of your business.
Sincerely,
Eric A. Rodriguez Regional Sales Manager WEX Inc. West Coast Cell (925) 203-0407 Fax (925) 313-8713 www.wexinc.com eric.rodriguez@wexinc.com
*Subject to credit approval, new accounts only. The 20 cents per gallon for 3 months promotional offer is
valid for applications received between June 24th through August 31, 2013. This promotional period begins on the date your account is opened and expires 3 months from that date.
